EmailTemplate.subject: Business Office Depot Account information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
(Insert Name),
Welcome to the Office Depot + Buying Power discount program.
Per your request, we have attached the Buying Power discount to your Office Depot account # (Insert Account number). In order to receive the associated discounts, you will need to utilize this business account number.
Office Depot has created a login to your new online account (below). Go to http://business.officedepot.com to login. If you have any issues logging in to your account or need any changes made to the account, please contact me.
Username: (Insert Username)
Password: (Insert password)
In addition, we have made shopping in the store easy with the attached Office Depot Store Purchasing Card. Please present this discount card to the cashier at checkout to receive your Buying Power discounted pricing. For your convenience, there is a coupon attached to laminate your card for free.
Carlos Delbrey is your dedicated Office Depot Business Account Manager.
He will provide excellent customer service and be a great resource for you. Feel free to give Carlos a call.
Carlos Delbrey Office Depot Business Account Manager 855-337-6811 ext 12671 charles.delbrey@officedepot.com
Please forward this email to any employees that purchase office supplies for your company and feel free to contact me with questions.
